divy29:7: yadā rājñā aśokena ardhāmalakadānena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā, sa bhikṣūnuvāca—kena bhagavacchāsane prabhūtaṁ dānaṁ dattam? bhikṣava ūcuh—anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā |
divy29:8: rājā āha—kiyattena bhagavacchāsane dānaṁ dattam? bhikṣava ūcuh—koṭiśataṁ tena bhagavacchāsane dānaṁ dattam |
divy29:9: śrutvā ca rājā aśokaścintayati—tena gṛhapatinā bhūtvā koṭiśataṁ bhagavachāsane dānaṁ dattam |
divy29:11: tena yāvaccaturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṁ pratiṣṭhāpitam, sarvatra ca śatasahasrāṇi dattāni—jātau, bodhau, dharmacakre, parinirvāṇe ca, sarvatra śatasahasraṁ dattam |
divy29:13: tatra ca catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattāni, trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṁ bhojitāni yatrekarmahatāṁ dvau śaikṣāṇāṁ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṁ ca |
divy29:14: kośaṁ sthāpayitvā mahāpṛthivīmantaḥpurāmātyagaṇamātmānaṁ kuṇālaṁ ca āryasaṁghe niryātayitvā catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattvā niṣkrītavān |
divy29:17: atha rājā idānīṁ na bhaviṣyāmīti viklavībhūtaḥ |
divy29:18: tasya rādhagupto nāmāmātyo yena saha pāṁśudānaṁ dattam |
divy29:19: tadā sa rājānamaśokaṁ viklavībhūtamavekṣya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca— yacchatrusaṁghaiḥ prabalaiḥ sametya nodvīkṣitaṁ caṇḍadivākarābham |
divy29:20: padmānanaśrīśatasamprapītaṁ kasmāt sabāṣpaṁ tava deva vaktram (1)|
divy29:21: rājā āha—rādhagupta, nāhaṁ dravyavināśaṁ na rājyanāśanaṁ na cāśrayaviyogaṁ śocāmi, kiṁ tu śocāmi—āryairyadviprayukṣyāmi |
divy29:22: nāhaṁ punaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṁ saṁghaṁ samakṣaṁ naradevapūjitam |
divy29:24: api ca rādhagupta, ayaṁ me manoratho babhūva—koṭiśataṁ bhagavacchāsane dānaṁ dāsyāmīti, sa ca me ’bhiprāyo na paripūrṇaḥ |
divy29:25: tato rājñā aśokena catvāraḥ koṭyaḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti hiraṇyasuvarṇaṁ kurkuṭārāmaṁ praṣayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy29:27: tasmiṁśca samaye kuṇālasya saṁpadir nāma putro yuvarājye pravartate |
divy29:41: atha rājā aśokaḥ saṁvigno ’mātyān paurāṁśca saṁnipātya kathayati—kaḥ sāmprataṁ pṛthivyāmīśvarah? tato ’mātya utthāyāsanādyena rājā aśokastenāñjaliṁ praṇamyovāca—deva, pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ |
divy29:42: atha rājā aśokaḥ sāśrudurdinanayanavadano ’mātyānuvāca— dākṣiṇyādanṛtaṁ hi kiṁ kathayata bhraṣṭādhirājyā vayaṁ śeṣaṁ tvāmalakārdhamityavasitam yatra prabhutvaṁ mama |
divy29:43: eśvaryaṁ dhignāryamuddhatanadītoyapraveśopamaṁ martyendrasya mamāpi yatpratibhayaṁ dāridryamabhyāgatam (3)|
divy29:44: athavā ko bhagavato vākyamanyathā kariṣyati? saṁpattayo hi sarvā vipattinidhanā iti pratijñātam yadavitathavādinā gautamena, na hi tadvisaṁvadati |
divy29:46: pratiśiṣyate ’smanne cirādājñā mama yāvatī yathā manasā |
divy29:49: bhraṣṭasvāyatano na bhāti kṛpaṇaḥ saṁpratyaśoko nṛpah chinnāmlānaviśīrṇapatrakusumaḥ śuṣyatyaśoko yathā (5)|
divy29:50: tato rājā aśokaḥ samīpo gataṁ puruṣamāhūyovāca—bhadramukha, pūrvaguṇānurāgādbhraṣṭaiśvaryasyāpi mama imaṁ tāvadapaścimaṁ vyāpāraṁ kuru |
divy29:51: idaṁ mamārdhāmalakaṁ grahāya kurkuṭārāmaṁ gatvā saṁghe niryātaya |
divy29:52: madvacanācca saṁghasya pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā vaktavyam—jambudvīpaiśvaryasya rājña eṣa sāmprataṁ vibhava iti |
divy29:53: idaṁ tāvadapaścimaṁ dānaṁ tathā paribhoktavyam yathā me saṁghagatā dakṣiṇā vistīrṇā syāditi |
divy29:54: āha ca— idaṁ pradānaṁ caramaṁ mamādya rājyaṁ ca taṁ caiva gataṁ svabhāvam |
divy29:56: tatathā bhujyatām yena pradānaṁ mama paścimam |
divy29:57: yathā saṁghagatā me ’dya vistīrṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet (7)|
divy29:58: evaṁ deveti s puruṣo rājño ’śokasya pratiśrutya tadardhāmalakaṁ kurukuṭārāmaṁ gatvā vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjalistadardhāmalakaṁ saṁghe niryātayannuvāca—ekacchatrasamucchrayāṁ vasumatīmājñāpayan yaḥ purā lokaṁ tāpayati sma madhyadivasaprāpto divā bhāskaraḥ |
divy29:59: bhāgyacchidramavekṣya so ’dya nṛpatiḥ svaiḥ karmābhirvañcitaḥ saṁprāpte divasakṣaye raviriva bhraṣṭaprabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ (8)|
divy29:60: bhaktyavanatena śirasā praṇamya saṁghāya tena khalu dattamidamāmalakasyārdhaṁ lakṣmīcāpalyacihnitam |
divy29:61: tataḥ saṁghasthaviro bhikṣūnuvāca—bhadantā bhavantaḥ, śakyamidānīṁ saṁvegamutpādayitum |
divy29:62: kutah? evaṁ hyuktaṁ bhagavatā—paravipattiḥ saṁvejanīyaṁ sthānamiti |
divy29:63: kasyedānīṁ sahṛdayasya saṁvego notpadyate? kutah? tyāgaśūro narendro ’sāvaśoko mauryakuñjaraḥ |
divy29:65: mṛtyaiḥ sa bhūmipatiradya hṛtādhikāro dānaṁ prayacchati kilāmalakārdhametat |
divy29:67: yāvattadardhāmalakaṁ cūrṇayitvā yūṣe prakṣipya saṁghe cāritam |
divy29:68: tato rājā aśoko rādhaguptamuvāca—kathaya rādhagupta, kaḥ sāmprataṁ pṛthivyāmīśvarah? atha rādhagupto ’śokasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca—devaḥ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ |
divy29:69: atha rājā aśokaḥ kathaṁcidutthāya caturdiśamavalokya saṁghāya añjaliṁ kṛtvovāca—eṣa idānīṁ mahatkośaṁ sthāpayitvā imāṁ samudraparyantāṁ mahāpṛthivīṁ bhagavacchrāvakasaṁghe niryātayāmi |
divy29:71: dadāmyahaṁ bhūtadharāṁ samandarāṁ saṁghāya tasminnupabhujyate phalam (11)|
divy29:73: dānenāhamanena nendrabhavanaṁ na brahmaloke phalaṁ kāṅkṣāmi drutavārivegacapalaṁ prāgeva rājaśriyam |
divy29:74: dānasyāsya phalaṁ tu bhaktimahato yanme ’sti tenāpnuyāṁ cittaiśvaryamahāryamāryamahitaṁ nāyāti yadvikriyām (12)|
divy29:76: tato rājā mahāpṛthivīṁ saṁghe datvā kālagataḥ |
divy29:77: yāvadamātyair nīlapītābhiḥ śibikābhir nirhāritvā śarīrapūjāṁ kṛtvā rājānaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti, yāvadrādhaguptenābhihitam |
divy29:78: rājñā aśokena mahāpṛthivī saṁghe niryātitā iti |
divy29:79: tato ’mātyairabhihitam—kimarthamiti? rādhagupta uvāca—eṣa rājño ’śokasya manorathe babhūva—koṭiśataṁ bhagavacchāsena dānaṁ dāsyāmīti |
divy29:82: yāvadamātyaiścatasraḥ koṭyo bhagavacchāsane dattvā pṛthivīṁ niṣkrīya saṁpadī rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy29:83: saṁpaderbṛhaspatiḥ putraḥ, bṛhaspatervṛṣasenaḥ, vṛṣasenasya puṣyadharmā, puṣyadharmaṇaḥ puṣyamitraḥ |
divy29:84: so ’mātyānāmantrayate—ka uapāyaḥ syādyadasmākaṁ nāma ciraṁ tiṣṭhet? nairabhihitam—devasya ca vaṁśādaśoko nāṁnā rājā babhūveti |
divy29:89: anyaḥ kaścidupāya iti? tasya brāhmaṇapurohitaḥ pṛthagjano ’śrāddhaḥ |
divy29:90: tenābhihitam—deva, dvābhyāṁ kāraṇābhyāṁ nāma ciraṁ sthāsyati |
divy29:91: yāvadrājā puṣyamitraścaturaṅgabalakāyaṁ saṁnāhayitvā bhagavacchāsanaṁ vināśayiṣyāmīti kukkuṭārāmaṁ nirgataḥ |
divy29:96: kimicchatha stūpaṁ saṁghārāmān vā? bhikṣubhiḥ parigṛhītāḥ |
divy29:97: yāvatpuṣyamitro yāvat saṁghārāmaṁ bhikṣūṁśca praghātayan prasthitaḥ |
divy29:99: tenābhihitam—yo me śramaṇaśiro dāsyati, tasyāhaṁ dīnāraśataṁ dāsyāmi |
divy29:108: tasya duhitā kṛmiśena yakṣeṇa yācyate, na cānuprayacchati—tvaṁ pāpakarmakārīti |
divy29:109: yāvatsā duhitā tena kṛmiśasya dattā bhagavacchāsanaparitrāṇāryaṁ parigrahaparipālanārthaṁ ca |
divy29:110: puṣyamitrasya rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhato yakṣo mahān pramāṇe yūyam(?) |
divy29:114: kṛmiśena ca yakṣeṇa mahāntaṁ parvatamānayitvā puṣyamitro rājā sabalavāhano ’vaṣṭabdhaḥ |
divy29:116: yadā puṣyamitro rājā praghātitastadā mauryavaṁśaḥ samucchinnaḥ |
